org.goobi.production.model.bibliography

Class Citation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.goobi.production.model.bibliography.Citation

  • public class Citation
extends Object
    The class Citation represents a citation as they are used in academic writings.
    Author:
    Matthias Ronge <matthias.ronge@zeutschel.de>

    • Constructor Detail

      • Citation

        public Citation(String format)
        Constructor. Creates a new citation.
        Parameters:
        format - format that is to be used to summarise the bibliographic metadata, may be one of the Citation.Type types. An unknown entry will be formatted as monograph.
